law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 38. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 346. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1), (4), (6) and (10). -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 6. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2062a-2, 2062a-18.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Forms -- Instructions -- Reports -- Records -- Duties and powers of secretary for human resources as to.
